name: ChamberLocked
description:
Disclaimer: Purchase of this base game includes the first chapter. Further chapters are DLC.

Check Extra Content On Our Youtube

You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive in abandoned house with demon, and find items to escape the house.

THE HOUSE


An old abandoned house, with lot of rooms, and furniture. You can see that someone lived here. But it looks like that it was abandoned over 20 years.

YOUR ROOM


First time you waked up you can see that you are in kinda pretty room, well you can explore this room but theres nothing extra, so try to get out.

ESCAPE


After some time you finally found exit, but you can see that something happened here. Lot of blood everywhere. Try to get out.
